history.content: The Center for Human-Compatible AI (CHAI) has opened applications for paid research internships! This is a great opportunity to get research experience and learn about the growing field of AI safety. It helps to have prior machine learning experience but is not required. I will very likely be one of the mentors for this program, so feel free to ask me any questions you have about the internship or application process :) I don't check Piazza regularly, so if I don't respond here you can email me at rohinmshah@berkeley.edu. Application deadline for summer internships is Feb 15. For more details see here.
history.subject: Paid Research Internships at the Center for Human-Compatible AI
